message: Hello All , I was creating an account on openshift.com and found that I can't use Egypt as my country so I assume I can't pay with an Egyptian credit card, which PaaS provider do you suggest which support paying from Egyptian Credit Card ? "or PayPal from Egypt"

data.message: Technical Requirements ; mainly support Python/Django "for now"
The free OpenShift account does not fit your needs?
Have you checked with Azure or Heroku both support PaaS for Python apps
for now it does, but I am still starting and I dont want to pick the wrong provider then get stuck when I get 10 million active users :D
I will check Heroku, but I liked the fact that I can enjoy a free tier with openshift
I would suggest terminal.com. They offer both barebones/pre-built machines. Disclaimer: I currently kinda work for them.
ok :) this is a plus for me
I think it will be opened soon in EMEA, I might be able to get more info, best of luck

By the tune you have 10 million active users you will have written your app 10 times already and Bern using a mix of languages and platforms, hence surely changed your hosting requirements.
That will be a goods problem to have, and you just cannot plan for it now. That passing may disturb you from starting to get your first active 10 users if the 1st place :)
Not hitting on you in particular. You doing like you know what you are doing. Just adding a must-have warning for readers seeing your comment.
